original: intros x y m. unfold Same_set, Included, Ensembles.In. intros m' H1. unfold Semantics.orp, Kdenotation. simpl. split; intros H2. - pose proof (sat_orp m x y) as [Hx Hy]. pose proof (Hx m' H1) as Hxm. apply Hxm in H2. destruct H2. + left. apply sat_mono with (n:=m'); auto. + right. apply sat_mono with (n:=m'); auto. - destruct H2. + apply (sat_orp m x y); auto. + apply (sat_orp m x y); auto.
